character.name: Pilot
description: A strange spaceman from a strange space sector. Takes control of his own ship, the <c=downside>Campanella</c>, to <c=keyword>block shots</c> for you.

goCampanella.name: Go, Campanella!
goCampanella.description: Launch the <c=downside>Campanella</c> from the missile bay. If it's on the field, move it in front of your missile bay and gain 1 <c=status>P. SHIELD</c> instead.

addCherryPicked.name: Apply cherry-picked
addCherryPicked.cardSelectText:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>cherry-picked</c> to, forever.
(<c=cardtrait>Cherry-picked</c> cards <c=cardtrait>unexhaust</c> when the <c=downside>Campanella</c> is destroyed!)

campanella.name: Campanella
campanella.description: If this would collide with a <c=midrow>midrow object</c>, it instead moves 1 space to the right of it.

cherryPicked.name: Cherry-Picked
cherryPicked.description: Returns from the <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> pile to your draw pile when the <c=downside>Campanella</c> is destroyed.

PShield.name: P. Shield
PShield.description: The next <c=keyword>{0}</c> times the <c=downside>Campanella</c> would be shot, it negates it and then moves 1 space to the right.

Coffee.name: Coffee
Coffee.description: Increase the range of <c=status>SWERVE</c> by <c=keyword>{0}</c>. <c=downside>Removed when the Campanella is destroyed.</c>

Swerve.name: Swerve
Swerve.description: If an incoming shot would hit you but miss the <c=downside>Campanella</c> by 1 space, it moves to block it. <c=downside>Decrease by 1 after triggering.</c>

RunAndGun.name: Run And Gun
RunAndGun.description: The <c=downside>Campanella</c> fires at the opponent for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage immediately after every move it makes. <c=downside>Removed when the Campanella is destroyed.</c>

CaffeinePill.name: CAFFEINE PILL
CaffeinePill.description: Gain 1 <c=status>COFFEE</c> and 1 <c=status>SWERVE</c> on the first turn.

CherryPie.name: CHERRY PIE
CherryPie.description: Choose a card with <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> in your deck. It gains <c=cardtrait>cherry-picked</c>.

YoYo.name: YO-YO
YoYo.description: Every turn, if the <c=downside>Campanella</c> is not in front of your ship, it moves 1 space towards it.

NailGun.name: NAIL GUN
NailGun.description: The <c=downside>Campanella</c> fires at the opponent for 1 damage every turn.

SeeingRed.name: SEEING RED
SeeingRed.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>Cards that don't <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> gain <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> and <c=cardtrait>cherry-picked</c>.</c>

Isabell.name: ISABELL
Isabell.description: You may have up to 2 <c=downside>Campanellas</c> on the field at once. When one is destroyed, the other is as well. When launching the <c=downside>Campanella</c>, gain 1 <c=status>P. SHIELD</c>.

TheTrialOfArrow.name: The Trial Of Arrow
TheTrialOfArrow.description: <c=downside>Campanella</c> fires for 4 piercing damage, then is destroyed.

TheTrialOfBomb.name: The Trial Of Bomb
TheTrialOfBomb.description: Destroy <c=downside>Campanella</c> and replace it with a <c=drone>big space mine</c>.

description.None: Convert all <c=status>shield</c> into <c=status>P. shield</c> and all <c=status>evade</c> into <c=status>swerve</c>.
description.A: Convert all <c=status>shield</c> into <c=status>P. shield</c> and all <c=status>evade</c> into <c=status>swerve</c>. Gain 1 <c=status>coffee</c>.
description.B: Gain <c=status>P. shield</c> equal to your <c=status>shield</c> and <c=status>swerve</c> equal to your <c=status>evade</c>.
